title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 520.4 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 520.4 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Data subject
shall mean any natural person about whom personal information has been
collected by an agency. (b) Privacy
impact statement shall mean a written disclosure to the Committee on Open

Government describing a system of records maintained by an agency from which
personal information is retrievable by use of a name or other identifier of a
data subject. (c) Record shall mean
any item, collection or grouping of personal information about a data subject
which is maintained and is retrievable by use of the name or other identifier
of the data subject. The term record shall not include personal information
which is not used to make any determination about the data subject if it is: (1)
a telephone book or directory which is
used exclusively for telephone and directory information; (2)
any card catalog, book or other resources
material in any library; (3)
any
compilation of information containing names and addresses only which is used
exclusively for the purpose of mailing agency information; (4)
personal information required by law to
be maintained and required by law to be used, only for statistical research or
reporting purposes; (5)
information
required by the agency which is necessary for the agency to answer unsolicited
requests by the data subject for information; or
(6)
correspondence files. (d) System of records shall mean
any group of records under the actual or constructive control of any agency
pertaining to one or more data subjects from which personal information is
retrievable by use of the name or other identifier of a data subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
520.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
